Sentencas: Adsorption mechanisms of noble metals (Ag, Pd, Pt) on MnO2-terminated (001) surface and their catalytic role for oxygen adsorption have been investigated using the first-principles density functional theory calculations.
Titulo: The Interaction of Noble Metal With La1-xSrxMnO3 (001) Surface and Catalytic Role for Oxygen Adsorption: A Density Functional Theory Study

Sentencas: The analysis of the adsorption energies reveals that the energetically favorable configuration for Ag and Pd adsorption is at the O site, whereas one for Pt adsorption is at the Mn site.
Titulo: The Interaction of Noble Metal With La1-xSrxMnO3 (001) Surface and Catalytic Role for Oxygen Adsorption: A Density Functional Theory Study

Sentencas: Pt atom exhibits the largest adsorption energy, followed by Pd and Ag atoms.
Titulo: The Interaction of Noble Metal With La1-xSrxMnO3 (001) Surface and Catalytic Role for Oxygen Adsorption: A Density Functional Theory Study

Sentencas: Both bond population and PDOS (partial density of states) analysis confirm the formation of adatomOMn bonds.
Titulo: The Interaction of Noble Metal With La1-xSrxMnO3 (001) Surface and Catalytic Role for Oxygen Adsorption: A Density Functional Theory Study

Sentencas: Adsorption is accompanied by a charge transfer between adatoms and surface atoms.
Titulo: The Interaction of Noble Metal With La1-xSrxMnO3 (001) Surface and Catalytic Role for Oxygen Adsorption: A Density Functional Theory Study

Sentencas: Significantly, we predict that the order on the increase of O2 adsorption energy follows the Pd?>?Ag?>?Pt due to pre-adsorbed noble metal atoms.
Titulo: The Interaction of Noble Metal With La1-xSrxMnO3 (001) Surface and Catalytic Role for Oxygen Adsorption: A Density Functional Theory Study

Sentencas: The calculated bond length and bond population of O2 molecule demonstrate that pre-adsorbed noble metal atoms facilitates O2 molecule dissociate to O atoms, thus contributing to the surface oxygen diffusion process.
Titulo: The Interaction of Noble Metal With La1-xSrxMnO3 (001) Surface and Catalytic Role for Oxygen Adsorption: A Density Functional Theory Study

Sentencas: Our calculations identify an important catalytic role of noble metal in LSM-based catalysts, which may improve electrochemical performance for SOFCs cathodes.
Titulo: The Interaction of Noble Metal With La1-xSrxMnO3 (001) Surface and Catalytic Role for Oxygen Adsorption: A Density Functional Theory Study
